section.section:
Except as provided in paragraph (2) of this subsection, a civil penalty under § 5-809 of this subtitle may not exceed:
$7,000 for each violation; and
if an employer does not correct a violation within the period allowed for correction, $7,000 for each day that the violation continues.

A civil penalty for a willful or repeated violation of a provision of this title, an order passed under this title, or a regulation adopted to carry out this title may not exceed $70,000 for each violation.
A civil penalty for a willful violation of a provision of this title, an order passed under this title, or a regulation adopted to carry out this title may not be less than $5,000.
